snippet.title: Total gameplay from the public beta released
snippet.description:
Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/davitmasia
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DavitMasia
Play my games here: https://kronbits.itch.io/

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******************* VIDEO INFO *******************

Total gameplay from the public beta released a few days ago.

You can play online here: https://kronbits.itch.io/kubyx

At the moment there are 15 levels for test. 30 minimun and maybe if people like it goes to 50-60, will see.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

***** STREAM / VIDEO CHANNELS *****
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/davitmasia/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/DavitMasia

***** SOFTWARE *****
Programming: Construct 2 (https://www.scirra.com/construct2)
Recording/Codec: OBS with NVENC H.264 (https://obsproject.com/)

***** MUSIC *****
EvilMind


Subscribe for more Pixel Art Tutorials, Programming or Game videos. Enjoy!.

THANKS for your support!

.
